title: Fuzzy Green Things
description: Available as an eBook and a Trade Paperback!Sophie Berger is a genius who spends her free time forming intricately laid plans for world domination. Her Guinea Pig just died. Her car is falling apart. Her best friend Chelsea Stevenson is paranoid that her older brother, Andrew, is stealing Sophie from her. But worst of all, her parents ignore her when not giving her expensive presents in order to buy her love. Being wealthy has its perks, but not at the cost of your happiness.
author: Jennifer Szewczuk
